description: The <0>Model Context Protocol</0> enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend Zhuge Shenma's capabilities. You can use <1>community-made servers</1> or ask Zhuge Shenma to create new tools specific to your workflow (e.g., "add a tool that gets the latest npm docs").

enableToggle.description: When enabled, Zhuge Shenma will be able to interact with MCP servers for advanced functionality. If you're not using MCP, you can disable this to reduce Zhuge Shenma's token usage.

enableServerCreation.description: When enabled, Zhuge Shenma can help you create new MCP servers via commands like "add a new tool to...". If you don't need to create MCP servers you can disable this to reduce Zhuge Shenma's token usage.
